body: Snow is fun for children and happy people. But what of the misanthrope, the bitter, the left-behind and burned-out? body: MY GREAT-GRANDMOTHER ANNA Arbeit was born in Brownsville, Brooklyn, in 1905. It was a rich area, she said.
